post.body: gr8 find the company logo post; made me laugh!
thx so much; again i'm amazed at what can be learnt in a matter of a 2-3 tweets;
no i don't; will chk out; thx for pointing it out kind sir
i only used to think SOA, only recently read up on REST etc; more i read more i realise both is wiser; but where/how to start...
interesting train of thought "urbanisation of info" - hope u explore it further and share ur thinking
was part of ark group site visits and saw boris in action; how r u inolved in it?
ditto the sky thing; it kinda pleasantly freaked us out!
have great day and did I tell u I luvz ya?
big bounce snds V interesting; opens up new theoretical and imaginative possibilities hey
merry Xmas V
on my end it's just iPhone addiction full stop! ww is concerned LOL
face off the movie in rl http://tinyurl.com/4axsg5
laying down a SOA strategy at work,a lot of theory out there but wish i could find rl examples in practice; the good, bad 'n the ugly re SOA
need to make architectural decision on SOAP XML Web Svcs VS REST HTTP - or both??? i wish i knew what to do
finished workshop with vendor nbr1 yesterday (bizflow), and started with vendor nbr2 today (nintex); vendor nbr3 (blackpearl) nxt week
little monkeys listening to vivaldi's 4 seasons and interpreting mood being invoked; 4yr old monkey says its when ben10 gets monster fish!
Dont you hate when ur phone rings at 5:30am and it's a wrong number...
if anyone's interested i'm currently reviewing these BPMS suites with vendors: nintex, blackpearl, bizflow;
it would be really neat if iphone would let u forward sms's; bummer! any non-jailbreak methods out there?

i officially need to hide the iphone; i'm spending more time with it than life

Officially on holidays!!!! Merry Xmas to all and a happy new year :)
